elements.name: el1503413864499
elements.label: Hero Headline
elements.microcopy: This is the paintbrush text over the hero image.

elements.name: el1503413872290
elements.label: Hero Deck
elements.value: What can we do collectively to create a sustainable sector?
elements.microcopy: This is the deck that appears under the paintbrush text.

elements.name: el1503600359967
elements.label: Body text
elements.value:
Sustaining coffee in face of climate variability, aging trees and farmers, and volatile markets will require new collaborations that effectively scale up efforts.

Our partners are working together to tackle some of the most pressing challenges facing the coffee sector.
elements.microcopy: This is a bit of introductory copy that appears between the hero and the action network boxes.

elements.label: Action Network Group 1 Text
elements.value: Sharing experience and lessons to help companies establish and achieve sourcing commitments
elements.microcopy: E.g., the goal of the Action Network.

elements.label: Action Network Group 2 Text
elements.value: Meeting the need to replant an estimated 2.2 million hectares globally while applying best practices that restore productivity, conserve the environment and promote ongoing R&R efforts.
elements.microcopy: E.g., the goal of this Action Network.

elements.name: el1503414109513
elements.label: Action Network Group 3 Text
elements.value: Ensuring a continued supply of labor and promoting good labor conditions across coffee-producing countries.
elements.microcopy: E.g., the goal of this Action Network.

elements.label: Action Network Group 4 Name
elements.value: Mapping + Monitoring of Coffee and Forests

elements.label: Action Network Group 4 Text
elements.value: Identifying innovative ways to map and monitor the extent of coffee and forests, and how this is changing over time.

data.name: Live on CMS
data.description: Successfully published to the CMS. Time to think about ongoing maintenance of the content!
